oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pension papers of Dr. Elihu P. Pierce
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: These documents pertain to the pension application in 1880 of Dr. Elihu P. Pierce, who served as Asst. Surgeon, 6th N. H. Inf., USA. It includes forms from the Department of the Interior pension office which assert that Pierce contracted rheumatism. Pierce's pension was approved on February 6, 1905.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
